description: Students pursue guided fieldwork experience in the United States.  Activities and readings in this
course build on the topics from ASIAN 210 and three semesters of language study.  Students
reflect on  the experience of Asians in America through readings, site visits, and local
interviews.  Students develop projects and follow a process of inquiry that will help them
understand how ordinary people construct "Asian" culture and society today. Prerequisite: ASIAN
fullname: Asian Conversations II:  Encountering Asia in America
